title: Project-Based Learning Design to Improve Recognition of the Value of Science Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Science Curriculum Content and Basic Pedagogical Knowledge
context.additional_context: Designed to help pre-service teachers recognize the value of diverse science teaching methods and select optimal instructional approaches tailored to learner characteristics. Strengthening competencies in developing and evaluating teaching methods applicable to real classroom environments through project-based learning.

learning_goals: Compare and analyze the strengths and limitations of various science teaching methodologies.
Select pedagogical approaches aligned with learner characteristics and goals, providing justified rationale.
Quantitatively measure the effectiveness of pedagogical applications in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
